description: This file implements a C++ class 'Mocastub' for interfacing with a Moca hardware component. It contains functions for initialization, prerequisites setup, GET and SET parameter APIs, and object creation/destruction, with external C linkage for integration with other components.

classes.name: Mocastub
classes.description: A class providing APIs for Moca component parameter management and lifecycle operations.

methods.name: bool initialize(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: Initializes the Mocastub object, registering necessary components.

methods.name: std::string testmodulepre_requisites()
methods.description: Sets pre-requisites for the test module by registering with the TDK agent.

methods.name: bool testmodulepost_requisites()
methods.description: Cleans up pre-requisites and terminates the agent connection.

methods.name: void Mocastub_Get(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Fetches a parameter value from the Moca component.

methods.name: void Mocastub_Set(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets a parameter value in the Moca component and verifies the change.

methods.name: void Mocastub_SetKeypassphrase(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets a key passphrase parameter in the Moca component.

methods.name: void Mocastub_SetOnly(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Performs a set operation and validates success.

methods.name: bool cleanup(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: Cleans up resources for the Mocastub object.

ctags.name: Mocastub_Get
ctags.pattern: /^void Mocastub::Mocastub_Get(IN const Json::Value& req, OUT Json::Value& response)$/

ctags.name: Mocastub_Set
ctags.pattern: /^void Mocastub::Mocastub_Set(IN const Json::Value& req, OUT Json::Value& response)$/

ctags.name: Mocastub_SetKeypassphrase
ctags.pattern: /^void Mocastub::Mocastub_SetKeypassphrase(IN const Json::Value& req, OUT Json::Value& response)$/

ctags.name: Mocastub_SetOnly
ctags.pattern: /^void Mocastub::Mocastub_SetOnly(IN const Json::Value& req, OUT Json::Value& response)$/
